name: Clockwork AI Agent Configuration
description: Configuration template for using Clockwork with LM Studio and Agno framework
setup_instructions: 2. Download the qwen/qwen3-4b-thinking-2507 model in LM Studio
3. Start LM Studio server on port 1234

troubleshooting.connection_failed: Ensure LM Studio server is running on http://localhost:1234
troubleshooting.model_not_found: Download the qwen/qwen3-4b-thinking-2507 model in LM Studio
troubleshooting.timeout_error: Increase timeout value or check model performance
troubleshooting.agno_import_error: Install Agno framework: pip install agno>=1.7.11
